MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY16 postcode area of Newtown affecting properties in Lon Gwern and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at  10:05am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30am on 24th December 2020
